root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 11-b-2, translated into en
root.data: 11.b By 2020, significantly increase the number of cities and human settlements that adopt and implement integrated policies and action plans for the inclusion of all and the rational use of resources climate change adaptation and mitigation and disaster resilience, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction (2015-2030), comprehensive management disaster risk at all levels
